title: The King of Braves: GaoGaiGar
resume: The King of Braves GaoGaiGar is an anime television series series which began in 1997, created by Sunrise's internal "Studio 7" under the direction of Yoshitomo Yonetani, and was the eighth and final in the Yūsha metaseries funded by Takara and produced by Sunrise.
